title: Krishna The God
narration: namaste dosto aaj hum bhagwan krishna ke baare mein baat karenge. krishna hindu dharm ke pramukh devtaon mein se ek hain aur unki kahaniyan aur updesh bahut prabhavshali hain.

title: Birth and Childhood
content:
Born in Mathura to Devaki and Vasudeva.
Raised in Gokul by Yashoda and Nanda.
Known for his playful nature and miracles.
image_desc: Baby Krishna with Yashoda. Type: painting
narration: bhagwan krishna ka janm mathura mein devaki aur vasudeva ke yahan hua tha. unhe gokul mein yashoda aur nanda ne pala tha. bachpan mein krishna apni natkhat harkaton aur chamatkaron ke liye jaane jate the.

title: The Butter Thief
content:
Krishna's love for butter.
Stealing butter from the gopis.
Symbolizes innocence and playfulness.
narration: krishna ko makhan bahut pasand tha. woh aksar gopiyon ke gharon se makhan chura liya karte the. yeh ghatna unki masumiyat aur khelne ki prakriti ko darshati hai.

title: The Divine Flute
content:
Krishna's enchanting flute music.
Attracts all living beings.
Symbol of divine love and harmony.
narration: krishna ki bansuri ki dhun bahut madhur hoti thi. yeh dhun sabhi jeevjantuon ko akarshit karti thi. bansuri unke divya prem aur samanjasya ka pratik hai.

title: The Raas Leela
content:
Krishna's dance with the gopis.
A symbol of divine love.
Depicts spiritual union.
image_desc: Krishna dancing with gopis. Type: painting
narration: raas leela krishna aur gopiyon ke beech ka ek divya nritya hai. yeh prem ka pratik hai aur aatma ke bhagwan se milan ko darshata hai.

title: Krishna and the Mahabharata
content:
Key role in the epic Mahabharata.
Charioteer for Arjuna.
Delivers the Bhagavad Gita.
image_desc: Krishna as charioteer for Arjuna. Type: painting
narration: krishna ne mahabharat mein ek mahatvapurn bhumika nibhai thi. woh arjun ke rath chalak bane aur unhone bhagavad gita ka updesh diya.

title: The Bhagavad Gita
content:
A dialogue between Krishna and Arjuna.
Discusses dharma, karma, and bhakti.
A guide to spiritual life.
narration: bhagavad gita krishna aur arjun ke beech ka ek samvad hai. isme dharma karma aur bhakti ke baare mein bataya gaya hai. yeh adhyatmik jeevan ke liye ek margdarshak hai.

title: Krishna's Teachings
content:
**Dharma**
Duty and righteousness.
Following one's path.
**Karma**
Actions and their consequences.
Law of cause and effect.
image_desc: Balance scale with dharma and karma. Type: illustration
narration: krishna ne dharma aur karma ke mahatva ko bataya hai. dharma ka matlab hai apne kartavya ka palan karna aur karma ka matlab hai apne karmo ke parinam ko samajhna.

title: Krishna's Forms
content: Krishna is worshipped in various forms.
image_desc: Various forms of Krishna. Type: collage
narration: bhagwan krishna ki puja vibhinn roopon mein ki jati hai. har roop unke divya gunon ko darshata hai.

title: Devotion to Krishna
content:
Bhakti yoga is a path to Krishna.
Chanting his name brings peace.
Love and surrender to God.
image_desc: People praying to Krishna. Type: photograph
narration: bhakti yoga krishna tak pahunchne ka ek marg hai. unke naam ka jaap karne se shanti milti hai. bhagwan ke prati prem aur samarpan hi bhakti hai.

title: Festivals Celebrating Krishna
content:
Janmashtami, Krishna's birthday.
Holi, the festival of colors.
Celebrated with joy and devotion.
narration: janmashtami krishna ka janmotsav hai. holi rangon ka tyohar hai. yeh tyohar anand aur bhakti ke saath manaye jate hain.

title: Conclusion
content: Krishna, a source of wisdom, love, and divine guidance.
image_desc: Krishna with a divine aura. Type: painting
narration: bhagwan krishna gyan prem aur divya margdarshan ka srot hain. unki kahaniyan aur updesh humein jeevan mein sahi rasta dikhate hain. dhanyawad.
